text: Matczyn is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bełżyce, within Lublin County, Lublin Voivodeship, in eastern Poland. It lies approximately north-east of Bełżyce and west of the regional capital Lublin. An unused airfield near the village was used in July 1944 during Operation Most III. ==References== Category:Villages in Lublin County
title: Matczyn
